Literature.Title: A naturally inspired antibiotic to target multidrug-resistant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Koirala B, Hernandez Y, Zimmerman M, Park S, Perlin DS, Brady SF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae 10031(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (pMQ124-mcr-1)(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047 (△phoP/Q+phoP/Q)(MIC=1µg/ml)
